reviews.review: Sin duda alguna un Juegazo. Sus nuevas mecanicas son de lo mas enriquecedora y su sentido del humor hacen de este juego una gran joya que no puedes perderte.
Odd case where the second game is on par if not better than the first. Valve did a great job and don't forget. The cake is a lie.
el mejor juegos del mundo

I'm going to tell you all a little story. A story of me, and my experiences with this amazing game.

A few years back, I bought the game for my X-box 360. Unfortunatly, I bought Portal 2 before I bought the first one. I was fairly confused on a lot of things, but it didn't effect my experience much. This was before I had Steam, or even a computer, and I couldn't find the first one on disk. Anyways, Portal 2 quickly became my favourite game. I loved everything about it, and still do. I quickly finished the game, and moved on. 

Over the next few years, it still remained my favourite game. I spent a lot of time looking at all the easter eggs and references in the game. When I finally got a computer and Steam, I bought the first game, and loved it. Then i decided to buy Portal 2 for Steam, for a multitude of reasons. Mostly because it was on sale. 

As most puzzle games are, the game wasn't quite the same as the first time, but still remains my favourite. I pocked around in all the corners, looking for the easter eggs I'd seen online, and the game was almost as great as the first time. It was easier, as I knew what to do, but still absolutely amazing. 

So, I highly recommend this game. 1000/10. Go buy it. Play it. Have fun doing it. This game is hard not to enjoy. Evarything is great. the jokes, the puzzles, the characters. it still remains my favourite game to this day, and will likely stay that way, at least until Portal 3, or Half Life 3 is released. GabeN please make it. Plz

Buenisimo juego,Mas que nada destaco la historia que tiene el modo de que te hace entrar en la piel de la protagonista y hacerte sentir emociones,Para que hablar de los personajes que salen en la historia son simplemente increibles tienen una personalidad tan divertida y tan alocada que es como si de verdad ellos cobraran vida y hablaran directamente al jugador,la jugabilidad,es un juego de puzzles,no eh jugado muchos juegos de puzzles en mi vida ya que no soy muy bueno para esto pero te aseguro de que este juego es simple y aunque algunas partes parecieran mas dificiles que nunca son simples y hasta divertidas recomendadicimo!

Uma ótima continuação, o enredo é sensacional e até conseguiu me surpreender mais do que o primeiro jogo ficando boquiaberto com o final surpreendente e suas mecânicas novas. Porém o que mais se destacou nesse jogo foi o modo multiplayer que torna o jogo muito mais divertido e interessante com um enredo próprio que se passa 10 anos após a história single desse jogo.

Pelo fato do destaque do multiplayer neste jogo, não impede você de comprá-lo e jogar o single, pois tem ainda os mapas do público no workshop e pode jogar o multiplayer com pessoas que você não conhece, porém não fica tão divertido jogando com um amigo, e ainda fica mais difícil por não ter um contato de comunicação e terá de usar os pings no jogo para calcular o tempo certo e tals...

Portanto, mesmo quem não tem amigos eu recomendo este jogo por aquelas observações que fiz acima e nem falei das Câmaras de desafios que tinha no primeiro jogo e claro tem nesse com as suas mecânicas diferentes. Aindo rezo para que tenha o terceiro jogo, pois como sabem, a Valve tem a fuc**** mania de parar no segundo jogo. Bom jogo!
和女朋友打通了双人模式，约耗时7个小时，难度与单人模式相当，不得不说发行商对待双人模式的制作一点都不马虎，场景同样大气磅礴。另外，本作的创意工坊也是神作，其中有很多同好精心制作的关卡，值得一玩。

Portal 2 оставила мне очень яркое положительное впечатление (после прохождения почувствовала легкую эйфорию, а это много значит). Одна из самых удивительных игр, которые мне попадались: увлекательный сюжет, хороший юмор, интересные головоломки над которыми действительно приходится думать. А вокальные данные ГЛэДОС, ммм... Однозначно рекомендую.

与其说传送门2是一款游戏，我认为不如说它是天才之作。它不是射击游戏，却胜似射击游戏。自半条命2脱胎换骨，少了几分残酷与血腥，却有着一种让人莞尔的幽默感。这部游戏带给我们的是前所未有的空间感与想象力，在绝妙的关卡设计之余还让故事背景有机地穿插在其中，在前半部分走完实验chamber之后来到户外颇有种豁然开朗的感觉。到最后往月球上开门更是神来一笔。一切的一切都彰显出超人的想象力与灵感，我很庆幸自己能在有生之年领略这样一款天才的作品，并且我希望在有生之年还能玩到Portal 3。

（评测于2015-02-19）

If you enjoyed the first Portal then you will enjoy this one... I caught Portal one and two on sale and I couldn't seem to walk away from them. At first i wasn't sure what I would feel about them but I am really glad that I played through them. ( I beat them both in about 20 hours which was split over the course of 4 days) I really enjoyed the humor, the realness of the characters and the fact that i was actually challenged over the course of my playthrough. Good Game Well done Valve...

I'm not sure i would recommend spending the $30 for both but if you see them on sale they are a must buy.. 

I hope you have as much fun as I did.

Cóż. Piszę to bezpośrednio po ukończeniu gry. Steam piszę, że rozgrywka trwała 12h, to chyba dość długo, co nie? :V Jednak przy takich grach nie patrzy się na czas gry (jest to kwestia indywidualna). Wracając do samej gry. Jeśli chodzi o rozgrywkę, to urzekł mnie humor w tejże gierce (chociażby ta akcja z księżycem xD). Pod kwestia fabularną nawet nieźle twórcy się spisali. Z łamigłówkami różnie bywało, niektóre bywały niebywale banalne, inne doprowadzały do frustracji.
Ogółem gra zasługuj na szacunek i warta jest kupna (Grafika nadal śliczna).
Osobiście daje 7.5/10 i do ulubionych.

Каждый раз, когда я открываю эту игру, я вспоминаю тот прекрастный момент когда еще пару лет назад я купил её себе на xbox360. Когда я первый раз столкнулся с смесью прекрасной головоломки, головокружительного сюжета и волшебной графикой. Я прошел эту игру порядка 5-6 раз(на xbox в особенности), и прошел бы еще столько же. Я не то что не жалею потраченых денег, за такой шедевр я отдал бы в 2 раза больше. В независимости от года, эта игра всегда будет в моем сердце. Если у вас её до сих пор нету, то советую купить...
